Ordnance Department, Richmond, Va., may 24, 1861.;;; musket and Rifle Flints. --This Department is anxious to procure Flints.;;; If persons having even a few will forward them to this office, they will be paid good prises, and will serve the State. Charles Dimmock, my 27 --ts Col. of Ordnance.

Ordnance Office. June 14th, 1861.;;; all Accoutrements and EQUIP MENTS delivered to the Ordnance Department of the State of Virginia will, from and after this date, be turned into the Ordnance Warehouse, at the corner of 12th and Cary streets. C. Dimmock, je 15 --ts Col. of Ordnance of Va.
